title: The letters of Mounsieur de Balzac. Translated into English, according to the last edition. By W.T. Esq
author: Balzac, Jean-Louis Guez, seigneur de, 1597-1654.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Richard Clotterbuck, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Ball in Little-Brittaine,
notes: A translation of: Epistolarum liber unus.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
